data.description:
A simple recolor of the standard Instagram layout and design.
Slightly larger story view.
Removes some of suggested accounts fields.

data.name: Soft Pink Theme - Roblox
data.description:
This is for all roblox players with a soft aesthetic and love pink! This is a very clean look for roblox, and not all over the place. I hope everyone enjoys, and future updates soon :)

This features ad blocking, avatar image behind character, and custom pick themed page.

data.name: Youtube Custom Color++
data.description: Hey! This style is same thing as RainbowTube++ but without the rainbow transition effect. Still comes with the same customizable settings and still works well with both Flattube and CleanTube. TL;DR Just a minor alteration on the original Made with by Justin Ikeako.

data.name: Scrollbar,scrollbar,
RainbowTube++
data.description: Hey! RainbowTube++ is a simple rainbow effect on any statically red elements in YouTube user interface which also comes with a Nyan Cat progress bar, a hover effect and a "WATCHED" overlay all of which can be disabled. This style works well with other styles such as Flattube and CleanTube Feel free to tell me what you think and suggest more elements that should be "Rainbowified". This style shouldn't interfere with many other styles. If you aren't about the animated life, you can also try Youtube Custom Color++ without sacrificing any of the setting presented on this style! Made with by Justin Ikeako.

data.name: xStyle theme
MxRP Felt
data.description: Bringing the classic Felt theme back to MxRP, from the old msparp days.

data.name: Tumblr Dark 2020
data.description:
This theme applies to the new Tumblr dashboard, as well as some parts of x-kit.
It's intended for those that don't want to go "full gothic" with Tumblr new dark mode, but still want a dark theme that will apply everywhere.

It also removes the "sponsored" advertising that appears in the dashboard.
